feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 04:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
